entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@realDonaldTrump New York paid an engineer with no background in medical supplies $69.1 million for ventilators at the direct recommendation of the WH coronavirus task force, after the engineer responded to a tweet by President Trump. 

The ventilators never came. https://t.co/qinkP3vs5F
